Title: Relates to certain lease terms for BOCES properties
Summary: Relates to certain lease terms for BOCES properties increasing the maximum rental period to 20 years.
LawCode: Amd §§1950 & 403-a, Ed L; amd §72-h, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the general municipal law, in relation to certain lease terms for BOCES properties
